item.title: CHRW
item.description: score:31 Chances: C.H. Robinson Worldwide, Inc. operates in multiple segments, including North American Surface Transportation and Global Forwarding, which indicates diversified revenue streams. The company’s expansion and automation initiatives, such as touchless appointments for truckload scheduling, demonstrate a commitment to efficiency and innovation.
